attributes.action: take such action as is required to ensure that all members of the 1966 World Cup winning squad and back-up staff are knighted for their services to football and the promotion of the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
